content:
Sure! Here are some popular restaurant options in Orlando:

1. The Boathouse - This waterfront restaurant at Disney Springs specializes in seafood and steak dishes, and has a vintage boat museum. 2. Morimoto Asia - This Asian-inspired restaurant at Disney Springs is owned by Iron Chef Masaharu Morimoto and features sushi, dumplings, and other Asian cuisine. 3. Bubba Gump Shrimp Co. - Located at Universal CityWalk, this restaurant is themed around the movie Forrest Gump and serves seafood dishes like shrimp, crab, and lobster. 4. The Cowfish Sushi Burger Bar - Also located at Universal CityWalk, this restaurant has a unique menu that combines sushi and burgers, along with cocktails and milkshakes. 5. Hash House A Go Go - This restaurant has several locations in Orlando and specializes in comfort food like chicken and waffles and hearty omelets. 6. Hawkers Asian Street Fare - This restaurant in the Mills 50 District serves Asian street food from countries like Malaysia, China, and Vietnam. 7. Christner's Prime Steak & Lobster - Located in the Dr. Phillips area, Christner's is a classic steakhouse with a upscale atmosphere and menu. These are just a few suggestions, but there are plenty of other great restaurants to choose from in Orlando, with cuisine ranging from Italian to Mexican to barbecue.
